Name: Cassini
Ingredients: 7.5 ml Joseph Cartron Double Crème de Cassis de Bourgogne
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Martini glass .
Prepare garnish of blackberry on rim or blackberries on stick.
Review: A simple but pleasant spirituous berry drink. Not a Cassis Martini, but a Cassini.
History: Created in 1998 by yours truly in London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Cassini contains 159 calories
